page.title: 20BMX IN YEADON
page.content: There is only one BMX track in Yeadon, and it is owned by the{Dambusters {Club}It is called that because it is built next to Yeadon Dam.About 20 riders practise every day,except Friday and Saturday when racing takes place.Spectators can watch free any time.{Andrew Lister}in our class won a medal for coming fifth in a race. There is a BMX shop in Yeadon called Melanie Vauvelles Ultra BMX.You can get all the bikes,spares and clothing there. The{British Champion,Andy {Ruffel,}came there to present club trophies this year.Our bikes are Raleigh Burners;one is blue and yellow and the other is gold and black.We go on the Whoops the Speed Jumps and the Table Top.The Whoops are two bumps that you jump over and the Speed Jump is one bump.The Table Top is a hill. {BY STEVEN FIRTH AND PAUL FIELDING
